original_text: You took your beautiful gold and silver rings and your jewels. You used them to make images of male idols for yourself. You worshipped them instead of me.
korean_text: 네가 또 내가 준 금, 은 장식품으로 너를 위하여 남자 우상을 만들어 행음하며

sentences.original_text: You took your beautiful gold and silver rings
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 아름다운 금과 은 반지를 가져갔고

sentences.original_text: You used them to make images of male idols
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것들을 사용하여 남자 우상들의 형상을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: You worshipped them instead of me
